name: about
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool arespass.
Tool description: AresPass is a password analyzer that calculates its entropy and shows a complete report that includes the password fragments having low randomness. Among the analysis carried out are multi-language word search, keyboard sequence search or irregular entropy distribution, to mention some of them.
API description: Fetches metadata from the AresPass API and returns it in the specified format.

outputformat.description:
**The format of the returned metadata.**

Allowed values are *json*, *xml* and *yaml*.

The default value is *xml*.
